actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for a 5-percent salary reduction for Members of Congress.

summary.text: Requires the rate of pay otherwise payable to Members of Congress for any pay period to be reduced by five percent. Directs this pay reduction to take effect the first pay period beginning after the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a 5-percent salary reduction for Members of Congress.
